website_summaries.verdict: With a solid rubber-padded bottom, this sturdy step stool is a great choice for toddlers and younger preschoolers.
pros: Best for children under the age of 4
Measures 13.5 inches deep by 9.25 inches wide by 6 inches high
Easy to clean with hot water
cons: Too short for the smallest of toddlers to reach the toilet, but should be fine by the time your child reaches 30 to 36 months

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We bought Babybjorn, Dreambaby and Kids best friend step stools to see which one we like best. Babybjorn feels sturdier, in our opinion better made - the top is completely non-slip corner to corner, not just dots of non-slip (and that also varies in quality between Dreambaby and Kids best friend even though they look very much the same). The non-slip strips on the bottom of Babybjorn also seems better made/installed. Dreambaby's bottom non-slip strips are similar to Babybjorn, while Kid's best friends only have 4 corners of non-slip. Here is our personal ranking: 1) Babybjorn, 2) Dreambaby, 3) Kids best friend. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: beegal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but a tad small for our 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old has been interested in what we are doing when we brush our teeth and wash our hands, so I though this step would help him reach the sink so that he can join in. It doesn't quite get him there. If he reaches as much as he can, he can get the tips of his fingers under the faucet, but can't reach the handles. That doesn't take away from the quality of the stool. It will work great for him when he gets a little taller and it seems well made. Its also not terribly bulky so it won't take up a lot of space in small bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Chilehead Craig

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item last week and I was not ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item last week and I was not sure if I got the right stool. Because the stool I got had no logo of the bear. It was plain white stool. Even there is no company's signature on the stool either.
customer_reviews.author: Miho DC

customer_reviews.title: excellent, nonslip
customer_reviews.text: We bought the baby bjorn potty chair for our newly potty training son and liked it so much that we went with this step stool also. We planned on him using it to get to the big toilet and/or wash his hands, but it's not quite tall enough for that yet (he's only 21 months). As of right now, we're using it as a stool for us to sit on while giving the kids a bath. It has also turned out to be the perfect height for my daughter to practice standing up on. The bottom is nonslip, and it's sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: JasonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: White top turns orange after a few months. Looks terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my granddaughter to use when she visits. At first I thought it was good purchase, but after having it a few months, the white rubber top started discoloring and looked dirty. I have tired scrubbing it with bleach and comet which lightens it up slightly, but only temporarily. The step stool seems well made, but honestly, I can't stand looking at it anymore. After having this for 9 months now the top as well as the rubber feet are a terrible orange.color. Would have been much better if the top and feet were black. I would not recommend. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stool
customer_reviews.text: This stool is well-made and sturdy. Before purchasing, I was concerned about tipping dangers, but we've had this stool for about 2 years now and that hasn't been an issue at all. We just purchased a second one since we like it so much! The gray color is a nice neutral and doesn't mess up the look of our bathroom. The plastic is not flimsy and is strong enough to hold myself and my husband as well with no problems. I like the grippy surface on top for extra stability, but it's not so rough that it's uncomfortable on bare feet. Would absolutely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Greg A

customer_reviews.title: Great stool for 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to give my 3 year old the independence she needed to get on and off the toilet. In her restroom we still have the original short toilet in the bathroom so the height of this stool is perfect for her to get on and off. I would highly recommend it. It doesn’t slip on the tile floor and my daughters bare feet grip well on the top of the stool. Stool is lightweight to move when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, sturdy and functional - but a little short for our 35" toddler.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a folding step stool that was dangerous/too tall for potty training. We love the look and the design, but it's about an inch too short. We still have to help him up and over the seat's splash guard (we are using the baby bjorn seat - which is awesome!). We're making due with it though because it is much safer than the other and he'll be able to use it all by himself as soon as he grows a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Cati

customer_reviews.title: Can support a grown woman
customer_reviews.text: This thing can support a full grown adult as I use it as a step stool occasionally. My son loves it and moves it all around the house to help reach things he's not supposed to be able to reach. My only wish is that the top would clean a bit easier. The bumps collect dirt and if my kid misses or drips on the stool, it's a tad hard to get in between all those little spaces or it collects cleaner and leaves residue. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Yates

customer_reviews.title: Not high enough for my 25 month-old
customer_reviews.text: This stool is very low. It's my fault because I didn't check the measurements, but I assumed this would be high enough for my son since the brand claims this is good for potty training. It would probably be fine if your little one is close to or over 3 years old, but my 25 month-old son can't reach the sink or the toilet seat with this stool. FYI, my son is 85th percentile in height.
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: this is not just her potty stool its the get into everything that she couldnt reach before stool... i regret buying this but not because it doesnt do what it says. that in mind i had to change a light and used it. held me at 6 ft 300 lbs so top notch imo i dont trust plastic yard chairs but this thing i will
customer_reviews.author: kenyon freeburg

customer_reviews.title: Used stool
customer_reviews.text: I received a used stool which was dirty and step marks all over. I didn't find any major scratches after it has been cleaned so I decided to keep it. Other than this everything else are great. The stool itself is very cute and sturdy. Make a perfect match with the existing potty.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Tang

customer_reviews.title: Great item to elevate (senior) dogs' food bowls
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different step-stools to use in elevating my Senior dogs' food & water bowls; to take a little pressure off their neck in having to stoop. This item works out the 'best', as the height is perfect, and above all, the rubber matting on the top has good grip on the bowls. Hope the product never changes.
customer_reviews.author: DDT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Modern, new look. Light weight and easy to move around. Only complaint is that the top of the step stool is covered with a bunch of small squares; it is good to have as it prevents slipping but a real chore to clean up when my son "misses" the seat when he uses the potty. I advise running it through the shower or tub to clean it otherwise you're sitting on cold tile or you are on your knees trying to wipe the stuff from between the cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Abi Breit

customer_reviews.title: Short, but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Solid design, easy for my three year old to move around, stylish and modern gray color. The only slight con is that it is on the short side, my very tall three year old (45”) still has to stand on his tippy toes on the stool to reach some sink handles.
customer_reviews.author: CheerHthr

customer_reviews.title: Great stool, pricey for what is is though.
customer_reviews.text: Great little stool. Doesn’t slide around. One star deduction because it’s a piece of plastic and it was pretty pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N.

customer_reviews.title: Height is too low
customer_reviews.text: height is too low compared with other step chair. my child is 5 years old and we still cannot use it. Ikea chair has a similar one with same height but only cost $5. The height is a problem. too low to serve the purpose of step chair
customer_reviews.author: Yh

customer_reviews.title: Multi functional
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and stability for my toddler. She uses it for the toilet and moves it to the sink to wash her hands as well. Also doubles as a “squatty potty” for the adults in the house lol
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs. James

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little stool
customer_reviews.text: This stool is the perfect height for my 3 year-old to reach the sink when brushing her teeth. It appears to be a good height once she graduates for her baby potty to the toilet. There's nothing really exceptional about it, but perhaps that's where the good design simply blends in with life.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: We tend to use this more to sit on while we wait for our son to use the toilet since he is too short to use it to get on the toilet himself. It is a good height for him to step up on and the bottom grips the tile well.
customer_reviews.author: Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great, quality product. Perfect for my 15 months old to use by the sing un bathroom, she can now reach the faucet and i can easily wash her hands. It is very sturdy and doesn't seem that it can tip over, even when my kid is standing on the very edge of it. Looks expensive and durable
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This stool takes up much less space than a squatty potty and is easily stored next to the toilet and out of the way. It's a perfect compact size for multiple uses: children and grown ups alike!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hendershott

customer_reviews.title: Good but use supervision
customer_reviews.text: I love how well the stools are made. It's nice and thick plastic, unlike the other flimsy Disney ones. It has rubber on the bottom and on top so your little ones don't slip. However, my kids have moved the stool and tried to get other things in the house. My son and daughter have both managed to make these stools tip and got some pretty bad marks on their backs from falling back into it. I was in the room at the same time and watching them. I am always behind my daughter now when she uses it jut in case she manages to tip it again.
customer_reviews.author: Swicki

customer_reviews.title: Works great for potty training
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with the toilet potty for my little 3yr old newphew who was struggling with potty training because he was afraid he’s fall in. After getting both the stool and the toilet potty, it workd great and really helped him to get potty trained. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Potty Training
customer_reviews.text: Started potty training our oldest child about 4 weeks ago, and this step stool is perfect. It’s not extremely tall, such as for when using to wash hands at a taller vanity, but it’s perfect for standard toilet height. Our son feels very secure on it. It doesn’t move at all, thanks to the rubber edge along the bottom. Plus, the rubber material on top provides great grip as well. Fairly easy to clean. I frequently use generic brand baby wipes to get the majority of stuff off the top from dirty shoes, but it can also easily be cleaned more thoroughly with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great stool to help my 3 year old daughter reach the sink to brush her teeth and wash her hands. We have this on wood floors and it does not slip. The chair is well built and supports the weight of my daughter. I got the grey one with the white top. If it every gets dirty, a little soap and elbow grease is all it takes to getting this thing looking new again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. G. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Not tall enough
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking, sturdy stool but the rubber on the feet is very narrow, only 1/8" wide, and it slides on our tile floor when our grandson tries to use it. It's only 6" tall, still too short for our short 3-year old grandson to climb on the toilet, which is why it was purchased. However, we've used it in other ways; 2-yr old had fun jumping from it as a pretend diving board in his little swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Gourmet

customer_reviews.title: Much needed for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: You must have one of these for your toddler. We've found it invaluable for potty training, bathroom duties and for the little one helping out around the house. It is lightweight so our son moves it on his own, it's stable with a rubberized contact points and is easy to clean. We've had this in use now for more than one year and highly recommend it. Good luck. Spring 2015 update. Gotta have this stool. It'll hold an adult in a pinch and my son, now 4, still uses it for just about anything around the house ranging from potty to kitchen. Good luck and thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Nannerpuss

customer_reviews.title: Great stool for kids
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about this stool is how sturdy it is. Good height to base ratio makes it very stable and no-slip rubber on the bottom keeps it from sliding. Quality materials and strong plastic. Anticipate it lasting very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Vash

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wish it stayed in place a tad better but overall it’s a great product and looks nice in the bathroom. I would definitely recommend this stool.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I like how durable this stool is
customer_reviews.text: I like how durable this stool is. Others commented that the stool with the white top showed too much dirt, so I ended up purchasing the one with the black top. I do wish it was taller so that my son could reach the sink, but for now he uses it to help him get up to the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: familyof3

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: Light-weight, yet stable. No tipping issues/concerns. Easy for our almost 2.5 year old to pick up and move around to different places whether it is to turn light switches off/on or give 'speeches' in the center of the kitchen! Works great for what we need it to do. We also have a 2-step stool that we use for the potty/pedestal sink as this doesn't have much height.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stool from a trustworthy brand
customer_reviews.text: Feels much more stable than our old step, and it's easy for toddler or mommy to move. Looks nice, too - just subtle enough to not scream BABY the moment you walk in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: K.H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet lightweight stool
customer_reviews.text: I love this stool! Sturdy yet lightweight so our toddler can carry it around and easily stand on it to wash her hands. Always satisfied with our BabyBojorn products.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Simple, yet effective design. This works well for my child. We also got the potty seat to go with it. Both are sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: EGEndeavors

customer_reviews.title: A helping hand
customer_reviews.text: for your toddler to reach and sit on the big potty, can also be used for adults to squat while pooping to prevent colon cancer.
customer_reviews.author: Stefaan VD

customer_reviews.title: item arrived used and dirty
customer_reviews.text: These are great step stools however this company sent a used and dirty step stool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son drags this "shool" all over the house! It gives him a boost for hand washing in the sink, gets him a better view of food prep on the counters and allows him to put laundry in our top loading washer. He uses it to reach the bottom of the toy box. He uses it to get a better look out the window. He uses it to climb onto the toilet. For better or worse, this gives him the extra boost he needs!
customer_reviews.author: MidwestMomof3

customer_reviews.title: Well made with quality materials
customer_reviews.text: This is our second for a second bathroom. The best quality. I use it as a step stool for a tall bathroom cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: cin kraft

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the look for my hall bathroom but daughter complains about the texture hurting the bottom of her feet while standing on it
customer_reviews.author: Duckfan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. We use it daily. Your child will not slip, as it has a rubber base . My little one uses it when she washes her hands or brushes teeth. When she grows up, I will inherit it, I will use it in the kitchen as a step stool. Made of durable plastic that will not crack and it is easy to clean. Black and white color will look good everywhere unlike acid green or pink stools you see around. Gender and age neutral. A bit overpriced for a piece of plastic, but looks like I am gonna use this for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sturdy....Just a little hard to clean during potty training.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give the stool 5 stars is because of the non-slip texture on the top. It makes it hard to clean up pee for those accidents you know will happen during potty training. I have to put the whole thing in the shower because using a rag doesn't get into the little dips.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this stool! My kids use it to reach the potty & to get on the bed. This is sturdy, I love the fact that it has non slip rubber in the bottom so it doesn’t slip when you go to step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Yeni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This step stool is perfect. We purchased to help our 2 year old reach the toilet but she prefers to carry it around the house and use it wherever she sees fit. Between the rubber grips and the wide base the stool is very stable and although she has fallen off a few times it is not a fault of the step but rather our daughter learning about gravity. With more practice (and remembering she is on a stool) falling will no longer be a concern as the stool is exceptionally stable. Considering how well made this stool appears to be I imagine we will get many years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great step
customer_reviews.text: Good size with a nonslip top and bottom plus easy to keep clean makes this a great choice. I really like that it doesn't take up a lot of room but my toddler still has plenty of space to stand on. It's light but we haven't had any tipping or turning over issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: This arrived quickly and works ok. I wish it ...
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and works ok. I wish it was just a little bit taller for my 2 year olds, but it does the job. It just not quite tall enough for them to reach the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson to help him reach the faucet when washing his hands. He has one at home as well. He also takes it into his bedroom so that he can reach the sock drawer himself. My grandson is 3 yrs. old and has been using it for 6 mos. It is lightweight, yet very sturdy. Easily cleaned, very easy to move and store. Available in a variety of colors. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: pookie

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: Stool slides when my toddler gets on and off it to use the potty and has fallen a few times on bathroom tile flooring. It is also too small for a toddler to get up and turn around on. The surface is not a non slip but more of just grid pattern plastic. Not safe to use for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to spend $20 on a step. The ladder is sturdy, perfect height for both sink and toilet, and easy for my toddler to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: This step stool is sturdy and so cute
customer_reviews.text: This step stool is sturdy and so cute. While potty training my son, he needed easier access to wash his hands. He is still a tad short even with the stool, but it does help in helping him with teaching hygiene habits.
customer_reviews.author: JCheng

customer_reviews.title: Excellent steps.
customer_reviews.text: We have a few of these at home for the kids. The top is non-slip and the bottom footing is also slip-resistant. The overall design is simple and modern like many contemporary Swedish designs. The step is strong enough for an average adult to step on if needed, we found. Very well built and easy to carry from room to room, if needed. The plastic is high quality and has no strange odors. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We use this cute little step stool all over the house. We use it in the restroom so that my toddler can brush her teeth and wash her hands. I also use it in the kitchen so that I can reach things on the higher shelves without having to climb on the counters or bring a chair in from the dining room. We really like that it has the non skid rubbery traction on the top and the legs so it's a little more stable. I would recommend the product to anyone looking for a great little stool. :)
customer_reviews.author: E.Walker

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sturdy step for toddler
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this little step stool. We had one before that was the wooden two step version, and our daughter kept falling off of it. She's only 22 months now, which may have been part of the problem before, but I'm really happy with the sturdiness of this product. I will say, our daughter is very tall for her age, so this could be too short for other littles to reach a sink.
customer_reviews.author: foxandrosie

customer_reviews.title: versatile! baby bjorn step stool rocks
customer_reviews.text: baby bjorn step stool. simple. looks good. toddler can drag it & lift it & move it around as he needs!
customer_reviews.author: mister robot guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice stool, too short to be useful
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and high quality stool but at only a little over 6” tall it doesn’t provide enough height to allow our 90% in height toddler to climb onto the big toilet or to reach the sink.
customer_reviews.author: mixedballerina

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe! Tips over easily.
customer_reviews.text: Please don't get this stool. It is not safe and should be taken off the market. It's tipped over several times, causing our two year old son to hit his head -- twice on a sharp corner.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle L. M.

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and sturdy stool but it's too low what I expected. I bought it for 2years old son but he still can not each the washbowl with this step. I think it's better to buy a 2step stool for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Stewarts

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, no skid and easy to sanitize, works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: White top always looks dirty
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to clean due to the texture of the top. The white top ALWAYS looks dirty. The size of the stool, however, is perfect for my toddlers, now preschoolers. The anti-slip top is functionally great.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyCPA

customer_reviews.title: I like the ribber on the top and the bottom
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves the independence this stool gives her. I like the ribber on the top and the bottom. Much safer than the cute wooden step stool I originally wanted. This one is also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Social Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great stool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for my daughter to climb on to the toilet seat herself. It's sturdy, non slip, and exactly as expected. The gray color is also nice and not an obnoxious kid-colored stool.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little taller, but I guess it will be great for a few years as my taller gets taller. One reviewer wrote that it was not sturdy and easily tipped over. That should not be the case whatsoever. I am 5"10" and 200 pounds and could not make the thing tip even though I tried. The bottom sticks well to our floor (laminate wood) and the top is heavy....I think that adds to the support. Better than others by far. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kodiackbear

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson as a step stool onto his potty chair. It has served multiple functions besides this. Quick and easy to transport step stool for his grandmother as well to reach a high place in a hurry!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and product
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the other lower reviews about it being over priced, it's just a step stool or the grip is bad or it tips over........... Did you buy the same product? This is a clean looking great stool with good traction and easy to use for little ones It's a trusted brand which I would highly recommend When you pay a little more you get better quality
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: BABYBJORN Safe Step, White
customer_reviews.text: What a great little step stool this is! Just the perfect size...nothing fancy, just 100% functional, well designed and made. It is much more compact than others out there, yet 100% safe for children to adults to use. We keep it on hand for our four little grandchildren to use at the bathroom sink or kitchen counter. I've tried others in the past...and this one is simply the best. A classic.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stool for potty training
customer_reviews.text: The perfect toddler stool! After purchasing another brand, I was on the hunt for something with a no slip type traction on the top. This is perfect for that! My little one can use this alone without worry of slipping when in socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: good grip but a little difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the stool has a lot of grip to it so it doesn't slide around. The top of the stool also has a lot of grip to it so the kids don't slide off, however, the texture of the top of the stool makes it very difficult to wipe off and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice large step
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 2 year old so she could get on the potty herself and wash her hands. She complained that her other foot stool wasn't big enough for her to turn around on so we purchased this and the step surface is large enough for her to step up and do a 180 without any help from mom and dad.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Safe, lightweight, small step stool
customer_reviews.text: Great stool, safe & easy to clean. My son also loves to carry it from his bathroom to bedroom, so the lightweight plastic is nice. My only complaint is that I wish it was an inch or two taller. And my son is very tall for his age (almost 2). He can't reach the faucet all that easily, and we even have a faucet extender. But he'll grow into it & I'm sure we'll use this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Mc

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this step for my grandson who is turning two to use to wash his hands. I should have looked at the height measurement before purchasing. I wish it was two inches higher and three or four inches wide (standing space). It is more like a "mini" step. It is attractive and sturdy. It was smaller in width and shorter in height than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy V

customer_reviews.title: Rubber on top provides good traction for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Rubber on bottom prevents slipping on tile or other solid floor. Rubber on top provides good traction for toddler. I like that the top is black as well. I have another stool that is white rubber on top and it looks dirty all the time. Toddler uses it to go potty. She can put herself on the toilet without any help.
customer_reviews.author: WyoMom

customer_reviews.title: Love these stools
customer_reviews.text: These stools are great! This is our second purchase so our little one won't have to drag his all over the house as much. It surprisingly holds a 190lb adult (although probably not recommended). We've had no stability issues with tipping or slipping. Nice colors and easy to clean. All-in-all, we've had great luck with all BabyBjorn products, and this stool is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: OregonWoodman

customer_reviews.title: This stool is so sturdy and perfect height for small children to reach the ...
customer_reviews.text: This stool is so sturdy and perfect height for small children to reach the sink and counter. I stepped/jumped on it myself to check it and I weigh 200 pounds, it didn’t even budge. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Krystine

customer_reviews.title: use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: i use this cuz my baby is too short but already active and wants to bounce/etc. so i use this under his feet. later it can be used for potty training, and it is also a step stool in the kitchen area for the shelves that a just a little too high for me. love this, use it all the time for everything. does slide on my bamboo hardwood floors tho, the antislip doesnt work perfectly with smaller weights like a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C

customer_reviews.title: Not tall enough, but great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Sturdy, doesn't slide at all, solid grip on top. It wasn't tall enough for my little guy to get on the potty, but we use it at the sink for hand washing. I wish there was a taller one because the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: iman21

customer_reviews.title: Solid build, light weight, doesn't tip over
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for. Toddler can move it, use, stand on it without any issue or assistance from us.
customer_reviews.author: a1a1b2b2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and pleasing to the eye. Even I will stand on it sometimes and it holds up great.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor R.

customer_reviews.title: BEST stool!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second stool. My kids love the first one we needed another so we can stop fighting over the one. It is very stable even with two kiddos on it. My kids use to reach the sink and get up to the toilet. Love this stool! Plus it comes in the best colors, like simple house colors not cartoons all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My lil one can carry it without any problems. Sturdy. I wish it was a little taller.
customer_reviews.author: Amarilis

customer_reviews.title: Pubic Hair Attached to Item
customer_reviews.text: One stair not for the product, but for a shipping issue. After opening the box and I began to pull the stool out of the bag that it was in and discovered what seems to be a PUBIC HAIR attached to the product. Pretty disturbing.
customer_reviews.author: jon swift

customer_reviews.title: Great Stool
customer_reviews.text: This stool is perfect! It's a great height for my son to use in front of the toilet for potty training, and washing his hands. He has no problem moving it around himself, and it's very sturdy, with no signs of tipping issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Holly

customer_reviews.title: The best stool!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 other stools before (reluctantly) deciding to buy this one. This truly does not slide around on my bathroom tiles! I also like that it has the big cut-outs on the sides, easier to pick up. I wish i had found this one first, one of the other ones cost a bit more and was the worst one of them all! I definitely recommend this to anyone! No more sliding and falling into the toilet while potty training!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica92908

customer_reviews.title: Looks taller than it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping my 2 1/2 year old son could use this step to get to the toilet and use the big boy toilet with the toilet trainer seat on it. But this step is shorter than his kids training toilet that with the lid closed can also be used as a step. He cannot get on the toilet himself and cannot reach the sink with this step either. This will work good when he is a little taller.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy and a pretty nice color that fits in nicely.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was pretty excited to get a "big girl" step! She uses it as a step, a chair and my favorite, a jumping box. She thinks she pretty hot stuff jumping on and off that bad boy. In the end it fills it's purpose perfectly and is solid,sturdy and slide resistant. Already bought another for nanas house!
customer_reviews.author: Craig&them

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Potty Stool
customer_reviews.text: This stool is perfect for my two year old to use in front of the potty. It does not slip on vinyl or laminate flooring. It is also very easy to clean as there are no grooves for accidents to build up in. Very solid, should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: mamaKyra

customer_reviews.title: Great stool
customer_reviews.text: Great size and shape and weight. Our 2 year old can easily pickup and move wherever she wants. Love that bottom it ‘grippy’
customer_reviews.author: K. Sheard

customer_reviews.title: Too Short
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described and is very durable. However, I didn't realize how short the product was when I ordered it. Now that we have it up against the toilet, we realize that it is not ideal for our 2-year old to get on the toilet. He tries, but has a lot of trouble on his own. I am going to look for something a little taller to help his independence.
customer_reviews.author: Steph16

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, but a little short
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for both my bathrooms so my 2.5 year old son would be able to brush his teeth at the sink. Unfortunately, it's a little short and my son just barely gets his chin over the sink. He's not short either, he's about 37.5 inches. I like the wide rubber surface and the rubber on the legs so it won't slip. It seems to hold up well no matter where he is standing on it. It would be a 5 star item, if only it added a few inches!
customer_reviews.author: Photolita

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from baby Bjorn
customer_reviews.text: We have not purchased a baby Bjorn product that we have not absolutely loved! This is a very sturdy stepstool and a very fair price. We use it in the bathroom for our first born to brush his teeth. The bottom of the stool has a complete rubber perimeter that keeps the stool family in place on our tile flooring. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: CTSEng

customer_reviews.title: Daddy I'm taller
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product ever since my son could walk. He is now three and half and loves his step stool. He hasn't fallen off of it and my wife has actually used it a few times with problems. I ended up buying a second one for my daughter. It's easy to clean. It is too short to use when my daughter goes to the potty though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tillery

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this stool. It's light enough so that he can pick it up and carry it anywhere he needs a stool. Turns out he's finding more and more places where it comes in handy. Also, I like that it's sturdy...he has at times stood on the edge and it doesn't tip or move.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Solid step stool, worth the price premium over other stools
customer_reviews.text: This stool is solid and not flimsy at all. The top surface and legs are rubber coated and don't slip on my lineoleum bathroom floor. It is very stable. It is well made and can easily support my weight without any flexing. My 2 year old son uses this for potty training and the height is perfect where he can stand over the toilet. Compared to the cheaper step stools, this one is worth the extra $$$ spent.
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very sturdy. Only wish the top wasn't white, it gets/shows dirt very easily.
customer_reviews.author: MacDavis

customer_reviews.title: Useful and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Still using this in our bathroom after 5 years. Good for kids to stand on while brushing teeth or hair, or as a footrest in front of the toilet. Don't hesitate to get this useful item, especially if you have a potty-training child.
customer_reviews.author: The Kolbe Family

customer_reviews.title: Great stool for my potty training toddler
customer_reviews.text: Great stool for my potty training toddler. The white top however gets dirty very fast and doesn't look that great. I'm constantly wiping it down. But I have boys with bare feet that run around outside and come in to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love this stool! Sturdy, non-slip, and stylish. Just go ahead and get all three babybjorn potty items. You'll be glad you spent a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Hamsand

customer_reviews.title: Alright...
customer_reviews.text: This stool is not quite high enough for my daughter to get on and off the toilet by herself. She is about 1 1/2 years old and about 73% on height (so she isn't short). So, of course, she can't reach the sink either. Also, it is a little top-heavy. She has difficulty setting it down right side up when she is moving it from one location to the next. On the flip side, it does seem to be very sturdy. The rubber strip on the legs keep it securely in place while the rubber step surface helps to keep her feet from slipping. It has room for improvement and will be more useful when she gets a little taller.
customer_reviews.author: CedeMom

customer_reviews.title: Bought to match potty
customer_reviews.text: This matches the potty I bought for my grandson. I want to instill in him the habit of proper hand washing after toilet use right away, and having this at the sink will help. I just wish this company had made this with two steps...one is not quite high enough for the sink we have. Even so, I would recommend this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: It's worth it!! I completely hesitated to spend nearly $20 on a plastic stool...but after reading so many positive reviews, I made the purchase- and haven't looked back! Our potty training cutie loves this stool! It's the perfect size (and weight) for him to pick up, move to the potty, to the sink, etc. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Easy to Move
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves having a stool she can use and mover herself.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Landis

product_meta.title: BABYBJORN Step Stool – White
product_meta.description:
Color:White

The wide rubber strip keeps the step securely on the floor even if the child moves around a lot. BABYBJÖRN STOOL WITH TWO NON-SLIP SURFACES FOR SAFETY
The BabyBjörn Safe Step provides comfort and security for both kids and parents, thanks to its two non-slip surfaces. The bottom of the stool features strong, firmly-attached rubber feet that ensure the stool won't slide on the floor while someone is standing on it. The top of the stool also features a non-slip rubber surface that provides traction for children to stand safely and confidently. Made of durable, PVC-free, BPA-free recyclable plastic, this sturdy step holds up for long-term use.

QUICK FACTS ABOUT BABYBJÖRN PLASTICS
 * Completely free from BPA (bisphenol A), PVC (polyvinyl chloride), phthalate esters, cadmium, lead, and bromine 
 *  Complies with relevant product safety standards 
 *  Playful design and bright colors to inspire children to use the products and learn 
 *  Recyclable 
 *  Tested and Safe

You can easily rinse the BabyBjörn Safe Step off under running water. TRANSPORTS EASILY AND WORKS IN ANY ROOM
Measuring 13.5 x 9.25 x 6 inches (L x W x H) and weighing 1.5 pounds, the Safe Step is simple to transport from room to room. Use it to give children that little boost they need for reaching items around the house, or keep it in the bathroom, so they can feel independent washing their hands and using the toilet on their own.The Safe Step is an ideal match for the BabyBjörn Toilet Trainer.

CLEANS EASILY AND COMES IN FUN COLORS
Like all BabyBjörn products, the Safe Step is a winner when it comes to style. The stool comes in vibrant colors, including Red, Blue, White, Gray, Green, Yellow, and Turquoise. Thanks to its playful, modern appearance, the step is fun for your child and won't interfere with your home décor. And with its smooth, rounded features that repel dirt, the step is extremely easy to clean with a simple hot water rinse.

ABOUT BABYBJÖRN: QUALITY, SAFETY, AND STYLE
A family owned company headquartered in Sweden, BabyBjörn has been producing innovative childcare products since 1961. Today, BabyBjörn works with an international network of pediatricians to develop products that reflect its core philosophy of quality, safety, and style. BabyBjörn ensures the quality of each of its products in terms of both durability and environmental impact by scrupulously overseeing every stage of the design and manufacturing process. Safety is also guaranteed through rigorous screening by industrial designers, testing institutes, and medical experts. This exacting attention to detail has earned BabyBjörn international recognition for its success in creating products that balance usability with style.



BRAND STORY
By BabyBjorn
feature_bullets: Non-slip; The rubber mat on top keeps the child safely standing, even with wet feet
The rubber strip keeps the step securely on the floor
Easy to keep clean; The step is easily rinsed off under running water
